game.name: Barbarian Escape
game.description:
You are going to meet with a kind of unique fun and challenge in the first time of your life! Do you think that you are skilled enough to accept it right away when the entire world is taking their steps back? Join Barbarian Escape and get ready to help the brave barbarian to reach a safe place to land! The best part is that it is a one-touch control game so you do not have to put your extra efforts in completing each level. 

All you need to do is just put your fingers on your mouse or tap the screen to move your character left or right. Be careful and try to help him avoid all the obstacles that you see in his way! Hitting any small obstacle could cause him the death so try to keep them away from all the dangers until he reaches towards a safe place to land. There are many deadly spikes and deadly obstacles on his way. You can help him to fly from side to side down the screen to help your character keep moving downward. 

Put your quick reflexes and flying abilities to the test to help this lovely barbarian fly down to the portal in this html5 escaping game! There would be no chances of getting bored since all 15 levels include unique and engaging challenges. Try to avoid all kinds of hurdles while shifting the position of your plane in the air! Move side to side by clicking/tapping or using arrow keys! Check out more tricky and engaging adventure games for boys that are also free to play online, no download required!
